title: Fireworks on the 4th
description: A HIGH SCHOOL HOCKEY STAR.A SINISTER GROUP BENT ON DESTRUCTION.LET THE FIREWORKS BEGIN.Just weeks after shutting down The Devilâ€™s Door, McSwain & Beck find themselves trapped in their most perilous adventure yet. Racing against the clock, their unique skills are put to the test against a sinister group bent on destruction. An explosive thrill ride where the sparks fly and the lives of thousands hang in the balance."Save the hockey star, save the city..."
author: C.R. Hiatt
